  • Fix for when generated backgrounds with opactity set cause opacity rules to bleed into child elements

    There are free tools online to generate background patterns for elements on your websites. Sometimes, there will be a problem where an opacity setting in one of them has the effect of bleeding over into child elements of the element who's background is being set, and that is not what you want.
